Posts.Title: biopsy scheduled MaryB66 Kimi89

Posts.Content: Jun 4, 2018 02:34PM Kara1981 wrote: hello! I am new to posting here. I found a lump in my breast last week. It did not show up on my Mammogram. Had Ultra Sound today and the radiologist said she thought it was a fibroadenoma but ordered a core needle biopsy to be sure. I am 37 and a Mom to a 4 year old and a 9 month old- I’m also still breast feeding. I looked at the US report and saw a braid 4a category. I guess I’m wondering about others who have had a similar experience...I am terrified of the biopsy. Any ideas on how it will effect breast feeding? I was told to pump that day because of the lidocaine.
Posts.Title: biopsy scheduled MaryB66 Kimi89

Posts.Content: Jun 5, 2018 09:42PM Kara1981 wrote: thank you all so much for telling me it won’t be that bad! You’d think after two babies this type of procedure would be a walk in the park but I’m a big baby with needles!
